notes.note: Collaboration with Intel, CEA, GENCI and UVSQ

Developed the concept based on $#cm_cv_my3#$ cTuning technology and developed first prototype with $#cm_cv_my3#$ team [$#cm_86ea434e815f5059_544749564b62bfc8#$, $#cm_86ea434e815f5059_286004aebddd15ff#$, $#cm_86ea434e815f5059_989b2c721778a8f9#$] as Intel Exascale Lab in-house autotuning infrastructure and repository extending cTuning1 framework and repository
Technology: mixed MySQL and NoSQL database; customizable python, PHP and C plugin and web-based infrastructure
Availability: private use - after 2012 some parts developed by $#cm_cv_my3#$ team members became available under GPL v3 license

title: Colaborative Codelet Tuning Infrastructure (CTI aka cTuning2)
to: decompose large applications into codelets for continuous characterization and tuning
